product_name: REI Recycled Camp Mug - 12 fl. oz.
long_description: The 12-oz. REI Recycled Camp mug lets you enjoy your favorite beverage while lounging by the tent. The mug is made of heavy-duty, BPA-free polypropylene. Made from 100% recycled materials, this mug can also be recycled at the end of its years of service to you. The 12-oz. REI Recycled Camp mug's lid design lets you sip when you travel.
short_description: The 12-oz. REI Recycled Camp mug lets you enjoy your favorite beverage while lounging by the tent.
